#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int isprime(int);
int main()
{
int t,u,l,sum,count;
cin>>t;
cout<<"\n";
for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
{int count=0;
cin>>l;
cout<<"\n";
cin>>u;
cout<<"\n";
for(int j=l;j<=u;j++)
{
int x=j;
sum=isprime(x);
if(1!=sum)
{
count++;
}
}

cout<<count<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
int isprime(int a)
{
int temp=0;int sum=0;int flag=0;
while(a!=0)
{
temp=a%10;
sum=sum+temp;
a=a/10;
}
for(int j=2;j<=sum/2;++j)
{
if(sum%j==0)
{
flag=1;
break;
}
}
if(flag==0)
{return sum;
}
else
return 1;
}
